languages.text: {n}Мужчина нервно трет ладони.{/n} "Фон Валанциус? Вас нет в списке гостей. Впрочем, это неважно — представителю Леди Теодоры на Футфоле открыты любые двери! Проходите — Капеллан вот-вот начнет церемонию. Куда же только запропастился гость Фиделио..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Мужчина нервно трет ладони.{/n} "Фон Валанциус? Вас нет в списке гостей. Впрочем, это неважно — представителю леди Теодоры на Футфоле открыты любые двери! Проходите — Капеллан вот-вот начнет церемонию. Куда же только запропастился гость Фиделио..."

languages.text: {n}He rubs his hands together anxiously.{/n} "Von Valancius? You're not on the list. But that hardly matters — all doors on Footfall are open to a representative of Lady Theodora! Please, come right in — Chaplain is about to begin. Now where is that last attendee, Fidelio..."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина нервно трет ладони.{/n} "Фон Валанциус? Вас нет в списке гостей. Впрочем, это неважно — представителю Леди Теодоры на Футфоле открыты любые двери! Проходите — Капеллан вот-вот начнет церемонию. Куда же только запропастился гость Фиделио..."

traits.locale_text: {n}He rubs his hands together anxiously.{/n} "Von Valancius? You're not on the list. But that hardly matters — all doors on Footfall are open before a {mf|man|woman} from Lady Theodora! Please, come right in — Chaplain is about to begin the ceremony. Now where is that last attendee, Fidelio..."

{n}He rubs his hands together anxiously.{/n} "Von Valancius? You're not on the list. But that hardly matters — all doors on Footfall are open before a {mf|man|woman} from Lady Theodora! Please, come right in — Chaplain is about to begin the ceremony. Now where is that last attendee, Fidelio..."

{n}He rubs his hands together anxiously.{/n} "Von Valancius? You're not on the list. But that hardly matters — all doors on Footfall are open to a representative of Lady Theodora! Please, come right in — Chaplain is about to begin. Now where is that last attendee, Fidelio..."

{n}He rubs his hands together anxiously.{/n} "Von Valancius? You're not on the list. But that hardly matters — all doors on Footfall are open to a representative of Lady Theodora! Please, come right in — Chaplain is about to begin. Now where is that last attendee, Fidelio..."

{n}He rubs his hands together anxiously.{/n} "Von Valancius? You're not on the list. But that hardly matters — all doors on Footfall are open to a representative of Lady Theodora! Please, come right in — Chaplain is about to begin. Now where is that last attendee, Fidelio..."

languages.text: {n}男人焦急地搓着双手。{/n}“冯·瓦兰修斯？你并不在名单上。不过不要紧，落脚港所有大门，都会向西奥多拉夫人的特使敞开！来吧，请进，牧师马上就要开始致辞了。好了，只剩最后一位成员了，菲迪奥到底去哪了……”
languages.original_text: {n}He rubs his hands together anxiously.{/n} "Von Valancius? You're not on the list. But that hardly matters — all doors on Footfall are open to a representative of Lady Theodora! Please, come right in — Chaplain is about to begin. Now where is that last attendee, Fidelio..."

traits.locale_text: {n}男人焦急地搓着双手。{/n}“冯·瓦兰修斯？你并不在名单上。不过不要紧，落脚港所有大门，都会向西奥多拉夫人的特使敞开！来吧，请进，牧师马上就要开始致辞了。好了，只剩最后一位成员了，菲迪奥到底去哪了……”

languages.text: {n}Se frota las manos, nervioso.{/n} «¿Von Valancius? No está en la lista... pero ¡no importa! ¡Todas las puertas de Paso están abiertas a los representantes de lady Theodora! Adelante, por favor; Capellán está a punto de empezar. Solo nos falta una persona: Fidelio...».
languages.original_text: {n}He rubs his hands together anxiously.{/n} "Von Valancius? You're not on the list. But that hardly matters — all doors on Footfall are open to a representative of Lady Theodora! Please, come right in — Chaplain is about to begin. Now where is that last attendee, Fidelio..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se frota las manos, nervioso.{/n} «¿Von Valancius? No está en la lista... pero ¡no importa! ¡Todas las puertas de Paso están abiertas a los representantes de lady Theodora! Adelante, por favor; Capellán está a punto de empezar. Solo nos falta una persona: Fidelio...».

languages.text: {n}男は不安げに両手をこすり合わせた。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス？リストには記載されていませんが…問題ありません。フットフォールはシオドーラ様の代表者をいつでも歓迎します！どうぞ、お入りください。まもなく教戒官の話がはじまります。最後の参加者、フィデリオを待っているのですが…」
languages.original_text: {n}He rubs his hands together anxiously.{/n} "Von Valancius? You're not on the list. But that hardly matters — all doors on Footfall are open to a representative of Lady Theodora! Please, come right in — Chaplain is about to begin. Now where is that last attendee, Fidelio..."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は不安げに両手をこすり合わせた。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス？リストには記載されていませんが…問題ありません。フットフォールはシオドーラ様の代表者をいつでも歓迎します！どうぞ、お入りください。まもなく教戒官の話がはじまります。最後の参加者、フィデリオを待っているのですが…」

languages.text: {n}Er reibt sich nervös die Hände.{/n} "Von Valancius? Ihr steht nicht auf der Liste. Aber das spielt keine Rolle – {mf|einem Vertreter|einer Vertreterin} von Lady Theodora stehen auf Footfall alle Türen offen! Bitte tretet doch ein – Ordenspriester wird gleich beginnen. Wo bleibt nur der letzte Teilnehmer, Fidelio ...?"
languages.original_text: {n}He rubs his hands together anxiously.{/n} "Von Valancius? You're not on the list. But that hardly matters — all doors on Footfall are open to a representative of Lady Theodora! Please, come right in — Chaplain is about to begin. Now where is that last attendee, Fidelio..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er reibt sich nervös die Hände.{/n} "Von Valancius? Ihr steht nicht auf der Liste. Aber das spielt keine Rolle – {mf|einem Vertreter|einer Vertreterin} von Lady Theodora stehen auf Footfall alle Türen offen! Bitte tretet doch ein – Ordenspriester wird gleich beginnen. Wo bleibt nur der letzte Teilnehmer, Fidelio ...?"

languages.text: {n}L'homme se frotte nerveusement les mains.{/n} « Von Valancius ? Vous n'êtes pas sur la liste... mais qu'importe. Les représentants de dame Théodora sont toujours les bienvenus à Castel ! Entrez, je vous en prie. Chapelain est sur le point de commencer. Il ne manque plus que Fidélio... »
languages.original_text: {n}He rubs his hands together anxiously.{/n} "Von Valancius? You're not on the list. But that hardly matters — all doors on Footfall are open to a representative of Lady Theodora! Please, come right in — Chaplain is about to begin. Now where is that last attendee, Fidelio..."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme se frotte nerveusement les mains.{/n} « Von Valancius ? Vous n'êtes pas sur la liste... mais qu'importe. Les représentants de dame Théodora sont toujours les bienvenus à Castel ! Entrez, je vous en prie. Chapelain est sur le point de commencer. Il ne manque plus que Fidélio... »

languages.text: {n}Adam, ellerini gergin gergin ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Von Valancius mu? Adınız listede bulunmuyor ama hiç mühim değil. Leydi Theodora'nın temsilcisi deyince Binliman'daki tüm kapılar açılır! Buyurun lütfen. Papazın konuşması başlamak üzere. Bir de son davetlimiz Fidelio teşrif etseydi..."
languages.original_text: {n}He rubs his hands together anxiously.{/n} "Von Valancius? You're not on the list. But that hardly matters — all doors on Footfall are open to a representative of Lady Theodora! Please, come right in — Chaplain is about to begin. Now where is that last attendee, Fidelio..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam ellerini gergin bir şekilde ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Von Valancius mu? Adınız listede yok ama bu formaliteleri geçebiliriz. Leydi Theodora'nın temsilcisi deyince Binliman'daki tüm kapıları açılır! Buyurun lütfen. Papaz'ın konuşması başlamak üzere. Bu arada son davetlimiz Fidelio nerede kaldı yahu?"
